question: Which country hosts the annual "Thessaloniki International Film Festival"?
explanation: The Thessaloniki International Film Festival (TIFF), organized by the cultural institution of the same name under the auspices of the Greek Ministry of Culture, is held every November in Thessaloniki. TIFF is one of the oldest film festivals in Southeast Europe and one of the regionâ€™s leading festivals, while it ranks as the most important film event in Greece.
